code: import React from"react";import error from"../../../img/error.jpg";import clear from"../../../img/clear.png";import styles from"./CartItem.module.css";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{setBasketItemPlus,setBasketItemMinus,removeItems}from"../../../redux/slices/basketSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CartItem(_ref){var id=_ref.id,name=_ref.name,price=_ref.price,img=_ref.img,amount=_ref.amount;var dispatch=useDispatch();var addCountPlus=function addCountPlus(){dispatch(setBasketItemPlus(id));};var addCountMinus=function addCountMinus(){if(amount<=1){dispatch(removeItems(id));}else{dispatch(setBasketItemMinus(id));}};var deleteItem=function deleteItem(){dispatch(removeItems(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.cartItem,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.content,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.itemImg,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.description,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.title,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.itemPrice,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.price,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[price*amount," \u0440\u0443\u0431."]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.input,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.quantityButton,onClick:addCountMinus,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"-"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.newInput,children:amount})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.quantityButton,onClick:addCountPlus,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"+"})})]})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.itemClear,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:styles.clear,src:clear,onClick:deleteItem})})]});}export default CartItem;
